title: Instructional Design for Training Childhood Picky Eating Management Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical training curriculum designed to help pre-service teachers systematically manage childhood picky eating in real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can design an early childhood picky eating management education module by applying the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development).
Learners can explain the principles of early childhood eating habit formation based on scientific evidence and develop educational strategies.
Over 90% of participants can utilize a tool to evaluate the validity of a picky eating management program.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
